entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:25 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
